Load in necessary packages:
```{r}
library(janitor)
library(tree)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(dplyr)
library(caret)
library(ranger)
library(vip)
library(devtools)
# From Prof. Higham's github:
library(compr)
```

Load in dataset:
```{r}
library(here)
RL_joined <- read_csv("~/Desktop/SLU_Fellows/RL_Datasets/RL_joined.csv", 
        col_types = cols(winner_factor = readr::col_factor()))
```


```{r}
RL_comp_mod <- comp_glm(winner_factor ~ -1, data = RL_joined,
                     p1 = "team_id", p2 = "team_id_orange")
```

```{r}
library(broom)
tidy(RL_comp_mod)
glance(comp_mod)

tidy(comp_mod)
summary(comp_mod)
AIC(comp_mod)



augment(comp_mod) ## need to clean up names of columns
augment(comp_mod) |> names()
augment(comp_mod, type.predict = "response")
```
